channel.title: Authors on Andrew Davis
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on Andrew Davis

item.description:
Andrew Davis is a masters by dissertation (MSD) student at the Univeristy of Essex. Supervised bu Alex Dumbrell, Andrew’s research primarily focuses on the structuring dyanmics of microbial communities and how the diveristy of these communities is connected to ecosystem processes. Utilizing R, bash, and other bioinformatics tools, Andrew is applying a variety modeling, machine learning, and network analysis methods.

In addition to his research Andrew is part of the Pint of Science team for his university and has helped run multiple sciencentific communication events for the Colchester area. In his free time Andrew enjoys hiking, traveling, and trying new food.
